name: Car Racing Vs Train Racing
description:
Are you ready racers for something "big & new “excitement???? Car Racing Vs Train Racing is yet another racing game from Bigcode Games Free Games. Racers get ready to race your cars with the ultimate simulation trains from the start point to the given destination. Drive your super speedy racing car with the fastest simulator trains in the limited given time to win the race. This is the biggest challenge for the racers to prove your driving skills, however, be careful with the obstacles on the road & climatic conditions. There are amazing eye catchy themes like desert, snow, forest & many more for you to explore! It’s real racing game vs simulation trains where the goal is to win the race with your super speedy car. Choose your favourite racing car & start the race against the simulation trains.
Grab your car, tap the accelerate button to speed up the cars & use the brake button to slow down or stop the cars.
It's Showtime! Racers get ready for some real action & show off some fun with your drifting skills.

Install & Play the coolest racing game Car Racing Vs Train Racing

Car Racing Vs Train Racing Features:

*It’s a Free Racing Game
*Thrilling Levels to enjoy off road
*Unique Levels to play
*Amazing racing game adventure
*Awesome driving controls
*Beautiful environments & graphics
*20+ Cool Upgrades
*Best addictive game Car Racing Vs Train Racing
*Racing with modern train simulators

If you love Car Racing Vs Train Racing, please do leave a comment.
